Dwayne Douglas Johnson[18] was born on May 2, 1972[18] in Hayward, California,[19] the son of Ata Johnson (née Maivia)[20] and professional wrestler Rocky Johnson (born Wayde Douglas Bowles).[21] His maternal grandfather, "High Chief" Peter Maivia, was also a wrestler, and his maternal grandmother, Lia Maivia, was one of wrestling's few female promoters, taking over Polynesian Pacific Pro Wrestling after her husband's death in 1982, until 1988.[22][23] Johnson's father is Canadian, of Black Nova Scotian and Irish descent,[24] while his mother has Samoan ancestry.[25][26]
